query.statement: SELECT 'A' ORDERSEQ, #TRID# ORGID, 'CMS¥Î√º' GUBUN, A.RMT_SUS_SEQ TRID, C.REC_DATE TRDATE, SC_CRYPTO_FUN('DEC', A.RMT_ACNTCD_ENC, '3') SUBINV_NAME, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE (GROUP_CODE = 'MA0116') AND (CODE = A.RMT_GUBUN)) TYPE_NAME, '' CUSTNM, '' TRDESC, NVL(C.REC_AMT, 0) TOT_AMT, NVL(D.EXC_AMT, 0) LINE_AMT, NVL(C.EXC_AMT, 0) ALT_AMT, NVL(C.REC_AMT, 0) - NVL(C.EXC_AMT, 0) JANAMT FROM MAS_RMT A, HLDC_TR_SUSPENSE C, HLDC_TR_SUSPENSE_EXC D WHERE (A.RMT_SUS_SEQ = C.SUS_SEQ) AND (C.SUS_SEQ = D.SUS_SEQ) AND (A.RMT_PARTIAL_SEQ = D.PARTIAL_SEQ) AND (A.RMT_ID = #TRID#) ORDER BY C.REC_DATE, C.SUS_SEQ, D.PARTIAL_SEQ
